metadata.title: CVE-2022-20424 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason:This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA. Further investigation showed thatit was not a security issue. Notes: none.
